objects.text:
• Genuine high-quality leather
• Adjustable shoulder strap
• Multiple compartments
• Classic minimalist design

product_details.name: Premium Vintage Leather Crossbody Bag - Timeless Elegance in Cognac Brown
product_details.description:
• Genuine high-quality leather construction with rich cognac brown finish
• Compact yet practical size perfect for everyday essentials
• Adjustable shoulder strap for customizable comfort
• Durable brass hardware with antique finish
• Multiple compartments for organized storage
• Handcrafted stitching details for enhanced durability
• Classic minimalist design suitable for both casual and formal occasions
• Natural leather that develops beautiful patina over time
• Secure magnetic or zip closure (based on model)
• Perfect size for phones, wallets, and daily necessities

banner_details:
This banner design promotes a premium product with a strong, bold presence. It features a rich, leather-toned diagonal background composed of layered brown gradients and accents, giving a tactile, rustic feel. The “heading_1” and “heading_2” text layers introduce the product with large, bold serif typography in a light tan shade (#FFE4C4), reinforcing a sense of quality and sophistication. The “subheading” in white enhances readability and emphasis. Below it, the “description” uses a smaller font to list key features in bullet points. The “price” text is bold and eye-catching in white, paired with a muted gold “cta_background” rectangle supporting the “cta” text in dark brown. A realistic “product_image” of a leather bag is anchored to the right, making it the central visual element.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Brown: #703D22  
- Medium Brown: #8B5A3C  
- Light Tan/Cream: #FFE4C4  
- Golden Brown: #D4A76A  
- Dark Chestnut: #3D2314  
- Accent Beige: #DDB892
product_color: The product image showcases a vintage-style leather bag with a warm, rich caramel brown tone that highlights the craftsmanship and texture of the leather. The dominant color is a smooth **Burnt Sienna** (#A45C27), subtly blended with **Saddle Brown** (#8B4513) in the darker folds and strap edges, creating depth and dimension. Highlights along the top and sides use **Light Caramel** (#D99058), accentuating the bag's natural gloss and patina. Metallic hardware in **Antique Gold** (#8C6E3F) adds refinement. This earthy, sophisticated palette is ideal for an ad banner with warm beige or neutral backgrounds (#F5F5DC), enhancing the product’s luxury and natural appeal.
